Message:
Nnnrgh... Why did I run away
crying like some kid...?
I wanna hide under a rock...

I thought for sure
Sabrina had enough of me,
but she came to see
how I was doing.

“We’ll start by helping you
get accustomed to the water,”
she said.

Y’know, Sabrina might
not be so bad after all...

...Yeah!
I know I’m better than this!
If water’s the problem,
all I gotta do is fix it!

“That’s the spirit.
As it so happens,
I know something
that’ll help us out.”

After saying that,
I saw her holding a bucket
filled to the brim with water.

...What’s thaaat...?
I hope you’re not gonna do
what I think you’re gonna do...

“If you have fun
playing with water,
it’ll stop frightening you.
Here!”

I can’t believe
you just splashed me!

No matter what you say,
I...AAAH!!
Why’s there water
attacking me from behind?!

This isn’t some water
splashing game, y’know...
No, wai... Sto...
